channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Lenovo XClarity Administrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Lenovo XClarity Administrator

item.title: CVE-2019-6158|2024-08-04T20:16:24.496Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: An internal product security audit of Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA) discovered HTTP proxy credentials being written to a log file in clear text. This only affects LXCA when HTTP proxy credentials have been configured. This affects LXCA versions 2.0.0 to 2.3.x.
